short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The screenshot extension that gets the job done.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Qt Screen Capture is a lightweight tool for creating screenshots on the web. It was made specifically to fill the reliability gap left by other tools. It is designed with maximum runtime performance in mind and thus it does not inject any unnecessary scripts into pages unless needed and wanted. 

Features:
- Tab capture
- Full page capture
- Element and scroll area capture
- Page zoom
- Page media capture: Images and video screenshots
- Video capture

Coming up:
- Doodle
